fields.title: Work Hours
fields.description: Consider the number of hours you need the maid to work daily and weekly.

fields.title: Duties Required
fields.description: List out all the specific duties and responsibilities you expect from the maid.

fields.title: Living Arrangements
fields.description: Decide if you need a live-in or live-out maid based on your requirements.

fields.title: Budget
fields.description: Consider your budget for the maid's salary and any additional benefits.

fields.title: Language Preference
fields.description: Specify any language preferences for better communication.

fields.title: Experience Level
fields.description: Consider the level of experience required for your specific needs.

fields.title: Special Skills
fields.description: List any special skills required, such as cooking specific cuisines or childcare experience.

fields.title: Holiday Coverage
fields.description: Plan for holiday coverage and replacement arrangements.

fields.title: Health Requirements
fields.description: Consider any specific health requirements or restrictions.

fields.title: Background Check
fields.description: Ensure thorough background verification is conducted.

fields.title: Training Needs
fields.description: Consider any specific training requirements for your household.

fields.title: Contract Terms
fields.description: Review and understand all contract terms and conditions.

fields.title: Insurance Coverage
fields.description: Ensure proper insurance coverage for both parties.

fields.title: Performance Review
fields.description: Establish a system for regular performance reviews.

fields.title: Emergency Contacts
fields.description: Maintain a list of emergency contacts and procedures.

fields.title: House Rules
fields.description: Clearly communicate house rules and expectations.

fields.title: Privacy Concerns
fields.description: Address privacy concerns and establish boundaries.

fields.title: Cultural Sensitivity
fields.description: Consider cultural differences and sensitivities.

fields.title: Equipment & Supplies
fields.description: Plan for necessary equipment and cleaning supplies.

fields.title: Replacement Policy
fields.description: Understand the replacement policy in case of issues.

fields.title: Payment Schedule
fields.description: Establish a clear payment schedule and method.

fields.title: Leave Policy
fields.description: Clarify leave policies and holiday entitlements.

fields.title: Communication
fields.description: Establish clear communication channels and protocols.

fields.title: Performance Metrics
fields.description: Define clear performance metrics and expectations.

fields.title: Safety Protocols
fields.description: Establish safety protocols and emergency procedures.

fields.title: Documentation
fields.description: Maintain proper documentation of all agreements and records.

fields.title: Quality Standards
fields.description: Define quality standards for all household tasks.

fields.title: Feedback System
fields.description: Establish a system for regular feedback and improvement.

fields.title: Conflict Resolution
fields.description: Have a clear process for resolving any conflicts or issues.

fields.title: Long-term Planning
fields.description: Consider long-term arrangements and career development.
